Title: IMPROVING BUG TRIAGING USING SOFTWARE ANALYTICS
Elements_risk_assessment:
The changed files identified before (i.e., modified and deleted files) are considered as
files that address the crash-related bugs
UseOF-SZZ:
to map these bugs to their related commits 
    and identify the commits due to which the crash-related bugs occurred
Summary: it examines commits that lead to crashes.
Outcome:
these commits are often submitted by less experienced developers and that
they contain more addition and deletion of lines of code than other commits
